value.name: Graphic warning: Tongan Crip gang member shot after lunging at witness with pen in dramatic Utah courtroom fracas
value.description: The video shows defendant Siale Angilau, a 25-year-old member of the Tongan Crip gang, calmly rising from his seat beside his attorney during the witness testimony and grabbing his lawyer's pen.

value.name: Utah lawmaker wants 2014 courtroom shooting video released
value.description: By The Associated Press | Posted - Dec. 23, 2015 at 2:10 a.m. This archived news story is available only for your personal, non-commercial use. Information in the story may be outdated or ...

value.name: Gang member shot four times in a US courthouse
value.description: Dramatic video released today shows Siale Angilau, 25, being shot four times by a US Marshal after attacking a witness with a pen. AddedMar 13th, 2018 A report into the death of seven-year-old ...

value.name: Alleged Gang Member Dies After Being Shot In Court
value.description: Officials say Siale Angilau, who was on trial for gang violence, was shot after attempting to stab a witness on the stand with a pen.
